empty.subheader: There are no posts in your queue at the moment. Try checking again tomorrow?

paused.subheader: Since you've paused your moderator status, you won't get anymore new cases.

post.title: Posted on {{date}}
post.reassignment: Time you have left to take action on the post before it is reassigned to another moderator

notice.title: A few things...
notice.description: Before posts are visible to the public, they must be reviewed to ensure that they comply with the community guidelines.

query.error: There was an error approving post {{id}}

modal.title: Select a reason for rejecting this post

textarea.label: Note
textarea.placeholder: Add a note describing the reason in detail...

modal.infraction: This rejection reason is an infraction. The poster's account will be temporarily suspended.

query.error: There was an error rejecting post {{id}}

history.title: Moderation History
history.description: Any moderation actions you do will appear here. You can undo any actions within 10 minutes of making them.

table.empty: Only the last 7 days of logs are available

query.success: This audit log was reverted. The post should appear back in your queue shortly.
query.failure: There was an error reverting the audit log

alert.expired: The time period to revert this audit log has expired
